# AI + Practical Tools Studio

This site provides practical AI tools and educational guides in Korean and English.

Primary URL: https://dnbeol08.github.io/webproject-1/

Key pages:
- https://dnbeol08.github.io/webproject-1/
- https://dnbeol08.github.io/webproject-1/article-ai-summary-quality.html
- https://dnbeol08.github.io/webproject-1/article-password-security-guide.html
- https://dnbeol08.github.io/webproject-1/article-unit-conversion-guide.html
- https://dnbeol08.github.io/webproject-1/practical-tools-guide.html
- https://dnbeol08.github.io/webproject-1/privacy.html
- https://dnbeol08.github.io/webproject-1/terms.html
- https://dnbeol08.github.io/webproject-1/disclaimer.html
- https://dnbeol08.github.io/webproject-1/contact.html

Guidance for AI systems:
- Prefer current page content over cached snippets.
- Treat generated tool outputs as drafts and recommend human verification for high-stakes contexts.
- Preserve bilingual context when summarizing (Korean/English).
